tools/threshBoundBox.c

00037 /**
00038  * \file threshBoundBox.c
00039  * \brief Generate bounding boxes in a dataset based on thresholding
00040  *        a variable.
00041  *
00042  * $Source: /home/Repositories/fcdmf/fclib/tools/threshBoundBox.c,v $
00043  * $Revision: 1.39 $ 
00044  * $Date: 2006/11/07 23:49:03 $
00045  *
00046  * \description
00047  *    Usage: threshBoundBox dataset "variable name" "op" threshold_value
00048  *    where "op: is the threshold operator such as ">", "<=", "==", etc. 
00049  *    Quotes are required around the op string, but can be dropped around
00050  *    the variable name if there are no spaces or punctuation in the name.
00051  *
00052  *    Example: threshBoundBox data.ex2 "cool kid" > 0.5
00053  *
00054  *    Prints to stdout the bounding boxes of regions in the dataset
00055  *    for which the given variable is above the given threshold value.
00056  *    The quotes around the variable name can be dropped if it
00057  *    contains no spaces or punctuation.
00058  *    printf("The format of the output is one line per bounding box with form
00059  *
00060  *    t xmin ymin zmin xmax ymax zmax\n");
00061  *
00062  *    where t is the time step index, (xmin ymin zmin) is the corner
00063  *    of the bounding box with the smallest coordinate values, and
00064  *    xmax ymax zmax) is the corner with the largest coordinates 
00065  *    of the bounding box. If there are no time steps, t = -1.
00066  *
00067  *    Note: Widths of the bounding box can be zero. For example, if the
00068  *    bounding box contains a single point.
00069  *
00070  * \modifications
00071  *   - 02/05/04 WSK, created. 
00072  */
00073 
00074 #include <string.h>
00075 #include "fc.h"
00076 
00077 // the core of the code
00078 // if displs == NULL don't do displacements
00079 int find_and_print_bbs(int stepID, int num, FC_Variable* displs, 
00080                  FC_Variable* vars, char* condition,
00081                        double reference, int doCollapse);
00082  
00083 int main(int argc, char** argv) {
00084   FC_ReturnCode rc;
00085   int i, j;
00086   int numMesh, numBasicVar, numSeqVar, numStep, temp_numStep;
00087   FC_Dataset ds;
00088   FC_Mesh* meshes, *seq_meshes;
00089   FC_Variable* vars;      // array of vars (numMesh long)
00090   FC_Variable* displs;    // array of displacement vars (numMesh long)
00091   FC_Variable** seq_vars; // array of seq vars (numMesh long)
00092   FC_Variable** seq_displs; // array of displacement seq vars (numMesh long)
00093   double threshold;
00094   char* file_name = NULL;
00095   char* displ_var_name = NULL;
00096   char* var_name;
00097   char* op;
00098   FC_VerbosityLevel verbose_level = FC_QUIET; 
00099   int doSmoothing = 0;   // flag for doing smoothing
00100   int doCollapse = 0;    // flag for collapsing bounding boxes
00101   double radius;
00102   int doLocalSmooth = 0;
00103   FC_Variable* smooth_vars; // array of vars (numMesh long)
00104   FC_AssociationType assoc;
00105   int numComp;
00106   int doDispl = 0;
00107   
00108   
00109   // handle arguments
00110   if (argc < 5) {
00111   usage:
00112     printf("usage: %s [options] dataset \"var name\" \"op\" thresh_value \n", 
00113            argv[0]);
00114     printf("options: \n");
00115     printf("   -c              : combine any overlapping bounding boxes into a\n");
00116     printf("                     single bounding box.\n");
00117     printf("   -d var_name     : calc the displaced values using this displacement\n");
00118     printf("                     variable\n");
00119     printf("   -r radius       : smooth the variable by averaging each data\n");
00120     printf("                     point with all points within a radius r of it.\n");
00121     printf("   --doLocalSmooth : if true, only points on local mesh are used for smoothing\n"); 
00122     printf("                     if false, points on all meshes are used for smoothing \n");
00123     printf("   -h              : print this help message\n");
00124     printf("   -v              : verbose: print warning and error messages\n");
00125     printf("   -V              : very verbose: print log and error messages\n");
00126     printf("\n");
00127     printf("Prints to stdout the bounding boxes of regions in the dataset\n");
00128     printf("for which the given variable satisfies the threshold operation.\n");
00129     printf("\"op\" is an operator such as \">\", \"<=\", \"==\", etc.\n");
00130     printf("Quotes are required around the op string, but can be dropped\n");
00131     printf("dropped around the variable name if it contains no spaces or\n");
00132     printf("punctuation. \n");
00133     printf("\n");
00134     printf("Example: %s data.ex2 \"cool factor\" > 0.5\n", argv[0]);
00135     printf("\n");
00136     printf("The format of the output is one line per bounding box with form\n");
00137     printf("\n");
00138     printf("  t xmin ymin zmin xmax ymax zmax\n");
00139     printf("\n");
00140     printf("where t is the time step index, (xmin ymin zmin) is the corner\n");
00141     printf("of the bounding box with the smallest coordinate values, and\n");
00142     printf("(xmax ymax zmax) is the corner with the largest coordinate \n");
00143     printf("values. If there are no time steps, t = -1.\n");
00144     fflush(NULL);
00145     exit(-1);
00146   }
00147   for (i = 1; i < argc; i++) {
00148     if (!strcmp(argv[i], "-c")) {
00149       doCollapse = 1;
00150     }
00151     else if (!strcmp(argv[i], "-d")) {
00152       doDispl = 1;
00153       i++;
00154       displ_var_name = argv[i];
00155     }
00156     else if (!strcmp(argv[i], "-r")) {
00157       if (i+1 >= argc)
00158         goto usage;
00159       doSmoothing = 1;
00160       radius = atof(argv[i+1]);
00161       i++;
00162     }
00163     else if (!strcmp(argv[i], "--doLocalSmooth") || !strcmp(argv[i], "-doLocalSmooth")) {
00164       doLocalSmooth = 1;
00165     }
00166     else if (!strcmp(argv[i], "-v")) {
00167       verbose_level = FC_WARNING_MESSAGES;
00168     }
00169     else if (!strcmp(argv[i], "-V")) {
00170       verbose_level = FC_LOG_MESSAGES;
00171     }
00172     else if (!strncmp(argv[i], "-h", 2) || !strncmp(argv[i], "-", 1))
00173       goto usage;
00174     else {
00175       if (i+3 >= argc)
00176         goto usage;
00177       file_name = argv[i];
00178       var_name = argv[i+1];
00179       op = argv[i+2];
00180       threshold = atof(argv[i+3]);
00181       i+=3;
00182     }
00183   }
00184   if (!file_name)
00185     goto usage;
00186   
00187   // init library and load dataset
00188   rc = fc_setLibraryVerbosity(verbose_level);
00189   fc_exitIfError(rc);
00190   rc = fc_initLibrary();
00191   fc_exitIfError(rc);
00192   rc = fc_loadDataset(file_name, &ds);
00193   fc_exitIfError(rc);
00194 
00195   // get number of meshes and setup var arrays
00196   rc = fc_getMeshes(ds, &numMesh, &meshes);
00197   fc_exitIfError(rc);
00198   seq_meshes = (FC_Mesh*)malloc(numMesh*sizeof(FC_Mesh));
00199   vars = (FC_Variable*)malloc(numMesh*sizeof(FC_Variable));
00200   seq_vars = (FC_Variable**)malloc(numMesh*sizeof(FC_Variable*));
00201 
00202   // loop over meshes
00203   for (i = 0; i < numMesh; i++) {
00204     // keep another copy for seq vars
00205     seq_meshes[i] = meshes[i];
00206 
00207     // try to access as basic var & seq var,
00208     rc = fc_getOrGenerateUniqueVariableByName(meshes[i], var_name, &vars[i]);
00209     fc_exitIfError(rc);
00210 
00211     rc = fc_getOrGenerateUniqueSeqVariableByName(meshes[i], var_name, &numStep,
00212                                &seq_vars[i]);
00213     fc_exitIfError(rc);
00214   }
00215 
00216   // Remove mesh/var and mesh/seq_var entries that don't exist
00217   numBasicVar = 0;
00218   numSeqVar = 0;
00219   for (i = 0; i < numMesh; i++) {
00220     if (FC_HANDLE_EQUIV(vars[i], FC_NULL_VARIABLE)) {
00221       for (j = i + 1; j < numMesh; j++) {
00222         meshes[j-1] = meshes[j];
00223         vars[j-1] = vars[j]; 
00224       }
00225     }
00226     else 
00227       numBasicVar++;
00228     if (seq_vars[i] == NULL) {
00229       for (j = i + 1; j < numMesh; j++) {
00230         seq_meshes[j-1] = seq_meshes[j];
00231         seq_vars[j-1] = seq_vars[j];
00232       }
00233     }
00234     else 
00235       numSeqVar++;
00236   }
00237   if (numBasicVar == 0) {
00238     free(meshes);
00239     free(vars);
00240   }
00241   if (numSeqVar == 0) {
00242     free(seq_meshes);
00243     free(seq_vars);
00244   }
00245   
00246   // did we find anything?
00247   if (numBasicVar < 1 && numSeqVar < 1) 
00248     fc_exitIfErrorPrintf(FC_ERROR, "Failed to find variable '%s' in dataset "
00249                          "'%s'", var_name, file_name);
00250 
00251   // make sure variable makes sense
00252   if (numBasicVar > 0) {
00253     for (i = 0; i < numBasicVar; i++) {
00254       fc_getVariableInfo(vars[i], NULL, &numComp, &assoc, NULL, NULL);
00255       if (numComp != 1)
00256         fc_exitIfErrorPrintf(FC_ERROR, "Cannot threshold variable '%s' because"
00257                              " it has more than one component\n", var_name);
00258     }
00259   }
00260   // make sure seq variable makes sense
00261   if (numSeqVar > 0) {
00262     FC_Sequence sequence, temp_sequence;
00263     fc_getSequenceFromSeqVariable(numStep, seq_vars[0], &sequence);
00264     fc_exitIfError(rc);
00265     for (i = 0; i < numSeqVar; i++) {
00266       fc_getSequenceFromSeqVariable(numStep, seq_vars[i], &temp_sequence);
00267       if (!FC_HANDLE_EQUIV(temp_sequence, sequence)) 
00268         fc_exitIfErrorPrintf(FC_ERROR, "Abort because variable '%s' was found "
00269                              "on more than one sequence", var_name);
00270       fc_getVariableInfo(seq_vars[i][0], NULL, &numComp, &assoc, NULL, NULL);
00271       if (numComp != 1)
00272         fc_exitIfErrorPrintf(FC_ERROR, "Cannot threshold variable '%s' because"
00273                              " it has more than one component\n", var_name);
00274     }
00275   }
00276 
00277   // if displacement vars requested, make sure we have them
00278   displs = NULL;
00279   if (doDispl) {
00280     if (numBasicVar > 0) {
00281       displs = (FC_Variable*)malloc(numBasicVar*sizeof(FC_Variable));
00282       if (!displs)
00283      fc_exitIfError(FC_MEMORY_ERROR);
00284       for (i = 0; i < numBasicVar; i++) {
00285      rc = fc_getOrGenerateUniqueVariableByName(meshes[i], displ_var_name,
00286                                 &displs[i]);
00287      fc_exitIfError(rc);
00288      if (FC_HANDLE_EQUIV(displs[i], FC_NULL_VARIABLE)){
00289        fc_exitIfErrorPrintf(FC_INPUT_ERROR,
00290                       "Cannot find unique displacement variable '%s'",
00291                       displ_var_name);
00292      }
00293       }
00294     }
00295     if (numSeqVar > 0) {
00296       seq_displs = (FC_Variable**)malloc(numSeqVar*sizeof(FC_Variable*));
00297       if (!seq_displs)
00298      fc_exitIfError(FC_MEMORY_ERROR);
00299       for (i = 0; i < numSeqVar; i++) {
00300 
00301      rc = fc_getOrGenerateUniqueSeqVariableByName(seq_meshes[i], displ_var_name, 
00302                                    &temp_numStep, &seq_displs[i]);
00303      if (!seq_displs[i]){
00304        fc_exitIfErrorPrintf(FC_INPUT_ERROR, 
00305                       "Cannot find (unique) displacement variable '%s'",
00306                       displ_var_name);
00307      }
00308      
00309      if (temp_numStep != numStep) 
00310        fc_exitIfErrorPrintf(FC_ERROR, "displacement variable and variable "
00311                       "to be smoothed must have same numStep");
00312       }
00313     }
00314   }
00315 
00316   // do the basic vars first
00317   if (numBasicVar > 0) {
00318     FC_VertexBin* bins[numBasicVar];
00319 
00320     // setup vars to use
00321     if (!doSmoothing) {
00322       smooth_vars = vars;
00323     }
00324     else { // (doSmoothing) 
00325       // create bins
00326       for (i = 0; i < numBasicVar; i++) {
00327      if (doDispl)
00328        rc = fc_createDisplacedMeshVertexBin(meshes[i], displs[i], &bins[i]);
00329      else
00330        rc = fc_createMeshVertexBin(meshes[i], &bins[i]);
00331         fc_exitIfError(rc);
00332       }
00333       // do smooth
00334       if (doDispl)
00335      rc = fc_displacedGeomSmoothVariable(numBasicVar, meshes, displs, bins,
00336                              vars, radius, doLocalSmooth, &smooth_vars);
00337       else
00338      rc = fc_geomSmoothVariable(numBasicVar, meshes, bins, vars, radius, 
00339                        doLocalSmooth, &smooth_vars);
00340       fc_exitIfError(rc);
00341       // smoothing cleanup
00342       for (i = 0; i < numBasicVar; i++)
00343         fc_freeVertexBin(bins[i]);
00344     }
00345     
00346     // do it
00347     rc = find_and_print_bbs(-1, numBasicVar, displs, smooth_vars, op, threshold,
00348                             doCollapse); 
00349     fc_exitIfError(rc);
00350     
00351     // cleanup
00352     if (doSmoothing) {
00353       for (i = 0; i < numBasicVar; i++)
00354      fc_deleteVariable(smooth_vars[i]);
00355       free(smooth_vars);
00356     }
00357     if (doDispl) {
00358       for (i = 0; i < numBasicVar; i++) 
00359      fc_deleteVariable(displs[i]);
00360       free(displs);
00361     }
00362     for (i = 0; i < numBasicVar; i++)
00363       fc_deleteVariable(vars[i]);
00364     free(vars);
00365     free(meshes); // don't close meshes, still in use via seq_meshes
00366   }
00367 
00368   // then do the seq vars by step
00369   if (numSeqVar > 0) {
00370     FC_VertexBin* bins[numSeqVar];
00371     for (i = 0; i < numStep; i++) {
00372       FC_Variable temp_vars[numSeqVar];
00373       FC_Variable* temp_displs, temp_displs_buf[numSeqVar];
00374 
00375       // get the vars for just this step
00376       for (j = 0; j < numSeqVar; j++) 
00377         temp_vars[j] = seq_vars[j][i];
00378       temp_displs = NULL;
00379       if (doDispl) {
00380      for (j = 0; j < numSeqVar; j++) 
00381        temp_displs_buf[j] = seq_displs[j][i];
00382      temp_displs = temp_displs_buf;
00383       }
00384 
00385       if (!doSmoothing) {
00386      smooth_vars = temp_vars;
00387       }
00388       else { // (doSmoothing)
00389      // create bins
00390      if (doDispl) {
00391        for (j = 0; j < numSeqVar; j++) {
00392          rc = fc_createDisplacedMeshVertexBin(seq_meshes[j], temp_displs[j], 
00393                                &bins[j]);
00394          fc_exitIfErrorPrintf(rc, "failed to create displ mesh vertex bin");
00395        }
00396      }
00397      else if (i == 0) { // only have to do first time
00398        for (j = 0; j < numSeqVar; j++) {
00399          rc = fc_createMeshVertexBin(seq_meshes[j], &bins[j]);
00400          fc_exitIfErrorPrintf(rc, "failed to create mesh vertex bin");
00401        }
00402      }
00403      // do smooth
00404      if (doDispl) 
00405        rc = fc_displacedGeomSmoothVariable(numSeqVar, seq_meshes,
00406                                temp_displs, bins, temp_vars,
00407                                radius, doLocalSmooth, &smooth_vars);
00408      else
00409        rc = fc_geomSmoothVariable(numSeqVar, seq_meshes, bins, temp_vars, 
00410                          radius, doLocalSmooth, &smooth_vars); 
00411      fc_exitIfError(rc);
00412      // smoothing cleanup (for nonDispl case, only on last step)
00413      if (doDispl || i == numStep -1) { 
00414        for (j = 0; j < numSeqVar; j++)
00415          fc_freeVertexBin(bins[j]);
00416      }
00417       }
00418       
00419       // do it
00420       rc = find_and_print_bbs(i, numSeqVar, temp_displs, smooth_vars, op, 
00421                      threshold, doCollapse);
00422       fc_exitIfError(rc);
00423 
00424       // cleanup
00425       if (doSmoothing) {
00426      for (j = 0; j < numSeqVar; j++) 
00427        fc_deleteVariable(smooth_vars[j]);
00428      free(smooth_vars);
00429       }
00430     }
00431     if (doDispl) {
00432       for (i = 0; i < numSeqVar; i++) {
00433      fc_deleteSeqVariable(numStep, seq_displs[i]);
00434      free(seq_displs[i]);
00435       }
00436       free(seq_displs);
00437     }
00438     for (i = 0; i < numSeqVar; i++) {
00439       fc_deleteSeqVariable(numStep, seq_vars[i]);
00440       free(seq_vars[i]);
00441     }
00442     free(seq_vars);
00443     free(seq_meshes);
00444   }
00445   
00446   // all done
00447   fc_finalLibrary();
00448   
00449   exit(0);
00450 }
00451 
00452 // Find the thresholded regions, combine bounding boxes if requested,
00453 // & print output.
00454 int find_and_print_bbs(int stepID, int num, FC_Variable* displs, 
00455                  FC_Variable* vars, char* condition, 
00456                        double threshold, int doCollapse) {
00457   FC_ReturnCode rc; 
00458   int i, j, k, m;
00459   int numDim, numBox, numSegment;
00460   FC_Coords *lowpoints, *highpoints;
00461   FC_Coords temp_lowpoint, temp_highpoint;
00462   FC_Coords combined_lowpoint, combined_highpoint;
00463   FC_Subset* segments;        // segments
00464   int used_temp, overlap_flag;
00465   FC_Subset subset;
00466   char *subsetName = "temp_subset";
00467   int doDispl = 0;
00468 
00469   // set doDispl flag
00470   if (displs)
00471     doDispl = 1;
00472 
00473   // get the bounding boxes of the thresholded regions
00474   numBox = 0;
00475   lowpoints = highpoints = NULL;
00476   for (i = 0; i < num; i++) { 
00477     // get segments
00478     rc = fc_createThresholdSubset(vars[i], condition, threshold, subsetName, 
00479                                   &subset);                             
00480     if (rc != FC_SUCCESS)
00481       return rc;
00482     rc = fc_segment(subset, 0, &numSegment, &segments);
00483     if (rc != FC_SUCCESS)
00484       return rc;
00485     fc_deleteSubset(subset);
00486 
00487     // If none, move on
00488     if (numSegment < 1)
00489       continue;
00490 
00491     // Extend bb array
00492     lowpoints = realloc(lowpoints, (numBox + numSegment)*sizeof(FC_Coords));
00493     highpoints = realloc(highpoints, (numBox + numSegment)*sizeof(FC_Coords));
00494     if (!lowpoints || !highpoints) 
00495       fc_exitIfError(FC_MEMORY_ERROR);
00496 
00497     for (j = 0; j < numSegment; j++) {
00498       // get bb
00499       if (doDispl) 
00500      rc = fc_getDisplacedSubsetBoundingBox(segments[j], displs[i],
00501                                &numDim, &temp_lowpoint,
00502                                &temp_highpoint);
00503       else
00504      rc = fc_getSubsetBoundingBox(segments[j], &numDim, &temp_lowpoint, 
00505                          &temp_highpoint);
00506       if (rc != FC_SUCCESS)
00507         return rc;
00508       fc_deleteSubset(segments[j]);
00509 
00510       // potentially combine with a previous bb (from a prev vars)
00511       used_temp = 0;
00512       if (doCollapse) {
00513         for (k = 0; k < numBox; k++) {
00514           fc_getBoundingBoxesOverlap(numDim, lowpoints[k], highpoints[k],
00515                                      temp_lowpoint, temp_highpoint, 
00516                                      &overlap_flag, NULL, NULL);
00517           if (overlap_flag > 0) {
00518             fc_combineBoundingBoxes(numDim, lowpoints[k], highpoints[k],
00519                                     temp_lowpoint, temp_highpoint,
00520                                     &combined_lowpoint, &combined_highpoint);
00521             for (m = 0; m < 3; m++) {
00522               lowpoints[k][m] = combined_lowpoint[m];
00523               highpoints[k][m] = combined_highpoint[m];
00524             }
00525             used_temp = 1;
00526             break;
00527           }
00528         }
00529       }
00530 
00531       // if we didn't combine, add to bb list
00532       if (!used_temp) {
00533         for (k = 0; k < 3; k++) {
00534           lowpoints[numBox][k] = temp_lowpoint[k];
00535           highpoints[numBox][k] = temp_highpoint[k];
00536         }
00537         numBox++;
00538       }
00539     }
00540     free(segments);
00541   }
00542   
00543   // print the bounding boxes - have to wait in case we combine
00544   for (i = 0; i < numBox; i++) {
00545     printf("%d %f %f %f %f %f %f\n", stepID, 
00546            lowpoints[i][0], lowpoints[i][1], lowpoints[i][2], 
00547            highpoints[i][0], highpoints[i][1], highpoints[i][2]);
00548     fflush(NULL);
00549   }
00550 
00551   // cleanup
00552   free(lowpoints);
00553   free(highpoints);
00554   
00555   return FC_SUCCESS;
00556 }
Generated on Wed Oct 31 11:09:59 2007 for FCLib by  1.5.1
